snippet: Acquisition of Volcano, a maker of catheter-based imaging and measurement devices, would bolster Philips’s lineup of medical imaging devices and expand its opportunities to sell its existing products to Volcano customers.
abstract: Acquisition of Volcano, a maker of catheter-based imaging and measurement devices, would bolster Philips’s lineup of medical imaging devices and expand its opportunities to sell its existing products to Volcano customers.

headline.main: Philips Agrees to Acquire Maker of Medical Devices for $1.2 Billion
